p: The co-primary efficacy endpoint of collection of ≥5 × 10 6 CD34 + cells/kg was achieved by 18 of 30 (60.0%) patients in the FD group and 17 of 31 (54.8%) patients in the WB group (Fig. 1; Supplementary Table S 2). The difference between dosing groups was not statistically significant (odds ratio, 1.91; 95% CI 0.44, 9.17; P = 0.395).
